attributes.review: This was the worst app ever it was very disorganized I did not like it Trump is one of the most stupid people in the whole entire world I think that he should fall in a ditch he is so racist he’s a white supremacist and doesn’t even like women if you were a woman reading this what are you doingHe just wants to sexually assault us and he doesn’t even like us so please don’t vote for him but for anyone except him and remember to vote for Kanye is a vote for Trump please don’t vote for a rapper he has no political interest in this he’s doing this for money and fame and to support trump this is the worst app again it is glitchy it is awful and I hate it thank you love the Gen zThat will ruin your career Mr. orange Cheeto
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: i was trying to download the app of our lord 🍊 and i had to wait 3 hours for it to download😞once it had downloaded the only thing that was on the screen was bernie sanders. i was shocked i wanted to see my lord 🍊who is the greatest president ever but it only had a slideshow of bernie sanders😩✨when i contacted customer service they said i had to give the app a five star review and proof that i did it in order for them to help me😢they were trying to manipulate me into giving them a five star review without helping me out🐍it was lord 🍊 who was doing this to boost his election🤬i was in my room when i saw him through the window knocking at my 🚪 i ran downstairs with all my trump merch and opened the 🚪 when i greeted him he threw my grandmother off her chair and threw 💩 at my floor🥺i was in shock. lord 🍊 has done all of this insulting my family and my home🏡😡i am now no longer supporting donald trump for being a rude, racist, and disgusting human being. i will now be taking my vote and business elsewhere✨👑🍸💗
attributes.title: this app is sooo bad👎👎

attributes.review: i have a brand new iphone 11 and tons of storage but this app took up at least a quarter of my storage and every time i opened the app it would crash so i thought maybe i needed to restart my phone. even after restarting my phone the app kept crashing and freezing my phone. eventually deleted the app and even now (a WEEK later) my phone keeps freezing and crashing. going to have to take it to the apple store and spend hundreds to get my phone fixed. NOT. HAPPY. this is a terrible app i do not recommend getting it unless you want your phone to be ruined and have to waste money fixing it.
attributes.title: Kept Crashing, Terrible App

attributes.review: I got this app to see what Trump was doing for the election while I was walking home. Right as I opened to app a 6 foot homeless man jumped out at me, licked my hand, slapped me, then told me that’s what I get for downloading the Trump app. I had no idea how he knew but later that day my step brother got aids, my grandma died of leukemia, my dog got his foot amputated and my dad was deported to Djibouti in Africa. Then before I was about to cry myself to sleep a witch came from out of my closet telling me that I am now cursed because I downloaded this app and the curse can only be broken if I deleted the app. Please if u have the app delete it!! It’s is a curse and only brings bad luck. How could u papi Trump 😢😰😓😱😩
attributes.title: I GOT THE APP AND NOW MY DAD IS IN AFRICA!!

attributes.review:
why does this cheeto man have an app? like what is it gonna do sell me fake spray tans? 

you see that’s what i thought before i downloaded the app. After i had downloaded the app, i realized i was wrong. Not only did they try to force upon me maga spray tans, but donald trump made his own appearance. After his face popped up on my phone, a knock came from my door. And low and behold, there was the spray tanned maga wearing cheeto himself. I of course didn’t let him in, but then Micheal Pencil decided to pick my lock and then the next thing i know i’m clad in maga standing at a trump rally. There were demons everywhere. To make a long story short, my soul unfortunately passed away due to this traumatic event. 🙈😌🤪✌️✨💞

The Trump app I had no idea.

  
Barry, I'm sorry.
Have you got a moment?

  
Would you excuse me?
My mosquito associate will help you.

  
Sorry I'm late.

  
He's a lawyer too?

  
I was already a blood-sucking parasite.
All I needed was a briefcase.

  
Have a great afternoon!

  
Barry, I just got this huge tulip order,
and I can't get them anywhere.

  
No problem, Vannie.
Just leave it to me.

  
You're a lifesaver, Barry.
Oan I help who's next?

  
All right, scramble, jocks!
It's time to fly.

  
Thank you, Barry!

  
That bee is living my life!

  
Let it go, Kenny.

  
- When will this nightmare end?!
- Let it all go.

  
- Beautiful day to fly.
- Sure is.

  
Between you and me,
I was dying to get out of that office.

  
You have got
to start thinking bee, my friend.

  
- Thinking bee!
- Me?

  
Hold it. Let's just stop
for a second. Hold it.

  
I'm sorry. I'm sorry, everyone.
Oan we stop here?

  
I'm not making a major life decision
during a production number!

  
All right. Take ten, everybody.
Wrap it up, guys.
I had virtually no rehearsal for that.
attributes.title: The app as a whole

attributes.review: When I first saw this app I was beyond elated to download it and follow our fearless leaders every move on his journey as the best president our nation has ever seen, but my excitement was quickly shattered by the unacceptable quality of this horribly designed and dangerous app! Once I downloaded it, my phone randomly starting playing replay by lyaz all throughout my day and I had to open the app and close it again for the song to stop playing. It was a disaster!!! Do not get this app as it will hack your device and spew out crass and ungodly music!! This is a disgrace for Sir Trump and I hope his fully competent administration can remedy the situation and produce an app that is worthy of his good name!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DOWNLOADED

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes of making america great again. But when the app finally finished downloading after six hours, something insane happened😱. The app crashed then suddenly started making my phone glitch. At first I just wasn’t able to open any of my other apps, but then a picture of an insanely large cheeto started popping up all over my screen. I couldn’t make it go away. Just cheeto after cheeto kept coming up and then, out of the blue, my phone just exploded. The only reason i’m able to write this review is because my dear grandma let me use her phone (thank you grandma) and i just wanted to warn everyone DONT USE THIS APP.

I download the app to see sum good reasons to vote for our racist and worst president ever🐀⭐️✨ and let me tell you sum it was not good i got hacked and it took 6 hours to download and I started to see sum strange things on this app and it is not good for you to download 🍊🥀 it is bad 🐀🐀 and it was working slow like trump 🐢🍊 the orange 🍊 and it said look behind you and I saw a trump flag👁👄👁 and I don’t own one at all never would😑 and the phone was laughing😰🧐🤓 so much ⭐️🐀🥰🦷 and I turned to the phone and turned back and the trump flag 🤬😱🤯😨😳😰😥was not there and the app is horrible don’t download 🤮🤢🤕👹👺🤡💩😈👿😴🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤓🍊🍊🤬🤬🐀🐀🐀🤮👽☠️💀👻😾👎👎👎🖕🧠👁👄👁🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕🖕 and it made my phone glitch
attributes.title: Trump 2020 🍊🌸 but in prison 🌺👑

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i wanted to support the orange man, but after i did my phone got hacked into and all of my information was stolen! 👿👹🤕 i tried to delete the app, but it won’t go away 🤢 i opened it up and immediately felt sick to my stomach with the revolting image that is shown. a couple days later cars kept driving by my house honking their horns and shouting trump 2020, and then one day when i wasn’t home, one of them came in and murdered the family dog, along with the rest of my family. this app has caused me severe emotional distress and i don’t know if i’ll ever recover. do NOT download it!!!!!!!! it will ruin your life.🙀
attributes.title: Awful app killed my whole family 😿
